feed.title: GitLab Backups for Bitcoin Core repository

entry.title: GitLab Backups for Bitcoin Core repository
entry.summary: In an engaging discussion on the Optech podcast, various insightful questions from the audience were addressed, shedding light on potential directions for future endeavors. These interactions underscored the importance of community engagement in shaping the trajectory of projects and initiatives. The episode, available for listening at [Optech podcast](https://bitcoinops.org/en/podcast/2024/03/07/), serves as a valuable resource for those interested in understanding the diverse perspectives and considerations that come into play when discussing advancements and innovations within the field.
